title: News: Die Antwoord release new track/ split with Interscope
content:
So after just one LP, Die Antwoord’s relationship with the record label Interscope is over. Earlier today the band released this statement.

So anyway… Interscope offered us a bunch of money again to release our new album TEN$ION.

But this time, they also tried to get involved with our music, to try and make us sound like everyone else out there at the moment.

So we said: ‘U know what, rather hang on to your money, buy yourself something nice…we gonna do our own thing. Bye bye’

It appears that Die Antwoord isn’t going to be toned down lightly. The 2 videos that followed the announcement cemented this even further, a cut called “FOK JULLE NAAIERS“, a track from their now self-released album TEN$ION. Stream the videos below and download the new track here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
